name: Symphony
description: Large-scale Western Classical Music works for orchestra, typically with four movements: 1) allegro, almost always in sonata-allegro form 2) a slow movement 3) scherzo or minuet 4) finale, typically allegro or rondo.

children.name: Choral Symphony
children.description: Combines symphonic Orchestral Music forces & structure with vocal parts for choir.

children.name: Sinfonia concertante
children.description: Fuses symphonic compositional structure and instrumentation with parts written for concertante soloists.
